vlive.korean: 함께 한 세월을 생각해 - 시민 진짜 가자! - 제발! Think about the time we spent together. - Civilians, please! - Please! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] AB6IX x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with AB6IX)
vlive.english: Think about the time we spent together. - Civilians, please! - Please!

vlive.korean: 적당한 거리는 유지를 해줘야지~ - 세월아 네월아 해야 된다며~ You need to maintain a right distance. - You said that I need to take my time. 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 아이유 분노의 시승식!
vlive.english: You need to maintain a right distance. - You said that I need to take my time.

vlive.korean: 얼굴이 세월이 묻어나는 나이라서 슬퍼요? You're sad that your face shows your age? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 오늘 기뷰니 좋은 사람🙈❣️
vlive.english: You're sad that your face shows your age?

vlive.korean: [으른 따나를 보며 지나온 세월 체감 중인 돌형] 세상이 참 빨라요 그렇죠? [Rocky is realizing how time flies after seeing adult San-Ha] Time really flies, right? 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 행복스트로💜
vlive.english: [Rocky is realizing how time flies after seeing adult San-Ha] Time really flies, right?

vlive.korean: 그런 세월의 뭔가... the time is like... 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #밤황치열시 #part.5 #DJ황치열

examples.korean: His years in prison have left deep scars. 발음듣기 그가 교도소에서 보낸 세월은 마음에 깊은 상처를 남겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His years in prison have left deep scars. 발음

examples.korean: Their investments have appreciated over the years. 발음듣기 세월이 흐르면서 그들이 한 투자의 가치가 올랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their investments have appreciated over the years. 발음

examples.korean: Her looks had not survived the ravages of time. 발음듣기 그녀의 외모는 세월의 유린을 피하지 못한 모습이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her looks had not survived the ravages of time. 발음

examples.korean: They recounted what had happened during those years. 발음듣기 그들은 그 세월 동안에 있었던 일에 대해 이야기했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They recounted what had happened during those years. 발음

examples.korean: Her passion for dancing never dimmed over the years. 발음듣기 세월이 흘러도 무용에 대한 그녀의 열정은 결코 수그러들지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her passion for dancing never dimmed over the years. 발음
